errors.name: InvalidAdmin
errors.msg: Access denied: Signer is not an authorized admin

errors.name: IdenticalTokenMints
errors.msg: Token mints cannot be identical

errors.name: InvalidTokenDecimals
errors.msg: Token decimals cannot exceed 18

errors.name: InvalidBinStep
errors.msg: Bin step must be between 1 and 100 basis points (0.0001 to 0.01)

errors.name: InvalidInput
errors.msg: BinArrayManager invalid input

errors.name: NonContinuousBinArrays
errors.msg: Arrays are not loaded aligned to lower bin id

errors.name: InvalidActiveId
errors.msg: Active ID must be within valid range

errors.name: InvalidBinPrice
errors.msg: Invalid bin price: must be greater than 0

errors.name: InvalidBinRange
errors.msg: Invalid bin range

errors.name: InvalidBinId
errors.msg: Bin ID is outside the valid range

errors.name: InvalidStartBinIndex
errors.msg: Start bin index is outside the valid range

errors.name: BinRangeTooLarge
errors.msg: Range must be within the limit

errors.name: NoBinArraysProvided
errors.msg: No bin arrays provided in remaining accounts

errors.name: BinArrayVerificationFailure
errors.msg: Bin arrays does not match expected

errors.name: BinArrayNotWritable
errors.msg: Bin array account is not writable

errors.name: BinArrayMismatch
errors.msg: Bin array does not belong to the specified lb_pair

errors.name: BinIdOutsidePositionRange
errors.msg: Bin ID is outside position range

errors.name: BinArrayNotFound
errors.msg: Cannot find bin array with liquidity

errors.name: BitmapExtensionAccountIsNotProvided
errors.msg: Bitmap extension account is not provided

errors.name: InvalidTokenDistributionForBin
errors.msg: Invalid token distribution for bin relative to active bin

errors.name: InvalidLbPair
errors.msg: Invalid liquidity book pair

errors.name: MathOverflow
errors.msg: Math operation overflow

errors.name: CannotFindNonZeroLiquidityBinArrayId
errors.msg: Cannot find non-zero liquidity binArrayId

errors.name: UnexpectedSwapError
errors.msg: Unexpected swap error

errors.name: BinArrayError
errors.msg: Unexpected bin_array error

errors.name: SwapCalculationError
errors.msg: Swap calculation error

errors.name: InvalidSwapParams
errors.msg: Invalid swap parameters

errors.name: PairInsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: Pair has insufficient liquidity for the requested operation

errors.name: UnauthorizedFeeOwner
errors.msg: Position owner must be sender

errors.name: NoFeesToClaim
errors.msg: No fees to claim found

errors.name: InvalidPositionWidth
errors.msg: Position width cant be more that  (MAX_POSITION_BINS - 1)

errors.name: BinIdOutsidePairRange
errors.msg: Bin ID is outside pair valid range

errors.name: DivisionByZero
errors.msg: Division by zero

errors.name: BinError
errors.msg: Unexpected bin error

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: Not enough liquidity to claim fees

errors.name: NotEnoughProtocolFees
errors.msg: Not enough protocol fees for withdrawal

errors.name: TypeCastFailed
errors.msg: Type cast error

errors.name: ZeroAmount
errors.msg: Amount cannot be zero

errors.name: DistributionTotalInvalid
errors.msg: Invalid total distribution: must be exactly 0 or 100

errors.name: EmptyDistribution
errors.msg: No bin distributions provided

errors.name: TooManyBins
errors.msg: Too many bins provided. It must be less than or equal to MAX_BIN_PER_ARRAY

errors.name: ExcessiveFeeUpdate
errors.msg: Fee parameter update exceeds maximum allowed change (max 1% or 100% of current value)

types.name: Bin
docs: Individual bin data containing liquidity and reserve information.
Each bin represents a discrete price point in the liquidity book where users can
provide liquidity. Bins store token amounts and track liquidity shares for
proportional withdrawal calculations.

fields.name: amount_x
docs: Amount of token X in the bin (excluding protocol fees)

fields.name: amount_y
docs: Amount of token Y in the bin (excluding protocol fees)

fields.name: price
docs: Cached bin price to avoid recalculation during operations

fields.name: liquidity_supply
docs: Total liquidity shares issued for this bin (equivalent to LP token supply)

fields.name: reward_per_token_stored
docs: reward_a_per_token_stored

fields.name: fee_amount_x_per_token_stored
docs: Accumulated fee amount of token X per liquidity share

fields.name: fee_amount_y_per_token_stored
docs: Accumulated fee amount of token Y per liquidity share

types.name: BinArray
docs: Array of bins covering a specific range of bin IDs.
Each bin array contains up to MAX_BIN_PER_ARRAY bins and represents a contiguous
range of bin IDs. Multiple bin arrays can be linked to cover the full price range
of a liquidity pair. The array index determines which range of bin IDs it contains.

fields.name: index
docs: Array index determining the bin ID range (bins: index*MAX_BIN_PER_ARRAY to index*MAX_BIN_PER_ARRAY+MAX_BIN_PER_ARRAY-1)

fields.name: _padding
docs: Padding for proper memory alignment

fields.name: lb_pair
docs: Associated liquidity book pair that owns this bin array

fields.name: bins
docs: Individual bin data stored inline for efficient access

types.name: BinArrayBitmapExtension
docs: Extended bitmap structure for tracking bin array initialization states.
This structure provides extended bitmap tracking for bin arrays beyond the basic
bitmap capacity of the LbPair account. It uses separate bitmaps for positive
and negative bin array indices to efficiently track liquidity distribution
across a wider price range.

fields.name: lb_pair
docs: Associated liquidity book pair that owns this bitmap extension

fields.name: positive_bin_array_bitmap
docs: Packed initialized bin array state for positive bin array indices

fields.name: negative_bin_array_bitmap
docs: Packed initialized bin array state for negative bin array indices

types.name: BinLiquidityDistribution
docs: Configuration for distributing liquidity to a specific bin in the DLMM.
Each distribution specifies a target bin ID and the percentage of tokens
to allocate to that bin. Percentages are expressed as integers from 1-100.

fields.name: bin_id
docs: Define the bin ID wish to deposit to.

fields.name: distribution_x
docs: DistributionX (or distributionY) is the percentages of amountX (or amountY) you want to add to each bin.

fields.name: distribution_y
docs: DistributionX (or distributionY) is the percentages of amountX (or amountY) you want to add to each bin.

types.name: FeeInfo
docs: Tracks per-bin fee accumulation and pending claimable fees for a position.

fields.name: protocol_share
docs: Portion of swap fees retained by the protocol by controlling protocol_share parameter. protocol_swap_fee = protocol_share * total_swap_fee

fields.name: base_factor
docs: Base factor for base fee rate

types.name: LbPair
docs: Core DLMM trading pair account containing all pair state and configuration.
This account stores the complete state of a liquidity book pair including token
configuration, fee parameters, active price bins, and liquidity distribution.
Uses zero-copy serialization for efficient on-chain access.

fields.name: parameters
docs: Static fee configuration parameters

fields.name: v_parameters
docs: Variable fee parameters that adjust based on market volatility

fields.name: last_updated_at
docs: Unix timestamp of the last trading interaction

fields.name: activation_slot
docs: Slot to enable the pair. Only available for permission pair.

fields.name: swap_cap_deactivate_slot
docs: Last slot until pool remove max_swapped_amount for buying

fields.name: max_swapped_amount
docs: Max X swapped amount user can swap from y to x between activation_slot and last_slot

fields.name: bin_array_bitmap
docs: Bitmap tracking liquidity distribution across price bins

fields.name: protocol_fee
docs: Accumulated protocol fees for both tokens

fields.name: token_x_mint
docs: Base token mint address

fields.name: token_y_mint
docs: Quote token mint address

fields.name: reserve_x
docs: Token X reserve vault account

fields.name: reserve_y
docs: Token Y reserve vault account

fields.name: fee_owner
docs: Account authorized to collect protocol fees

fields.name: base_key
docs: Base keypair. Only required for permission pair

fields.name: whitelisted_wallet
docs: Whitelisted wallet

fields.name: active_id
docs: Current active bin ID where trading activity is concentrated

fields.name: bin_step
docs: Price step between adjacent bins in basis points

fields.name: pair_type
docs: Type of the pair (0 = Permissionless, 1 = Permission)

fields.name: status
docs: Current operational status of the pair (0 = Enabled, 1 = Disabled)

fields.name: bump_seed
docs: PDA bump seed for account derivation

fields.name: bin_step_seed
docs: Bin step encoded as bytes for PDA derivation

fields.name: _padding
docs: Memory alignment padding

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved space for future protocol upgrades

types.name: LiquidityParameter
docs: Parameters for adding liquidity to a DLMM liquidity book pair.
Specifies the total token amounts and how they should be distributed
across multiple price bins according to DLMM rules.

fields.name: amount_x
docs: Amount of X token to deposit

fields.name: amount_y
docs: Amount of Y token to deposit

fields.name: bin_liquidity_dist
docs: Liquidity distribution to each bins

types.name: Position
docs: User position account tracking liquidity shares across multiple bins.
Each user can have one position per liquidity pair, which tracks their
liquidity shares across all bins where they have deposited tokens.
Uses zero-copy serialization for efficient on-chain access.

fields.name: lb_pair
docs: The LB pair of this position

fields.name: owner
docs: Owner of the position. Client rely on this to to fetch their positions.

fields.name: liquidity_shares
docs: Liquidity shares of this position in bins (lower_bin_id <-> upper_bin_id). This is the same as LP concept.

fields.name: reward_infos
docs: Farming reward information

fields.name: lower_bin_id
docs: Lowest bin ID with liquidity in this position

fields.name: upper_bin_id
docs: Highest bin ID with liquidity in this position

fields.name: last_updated_at
docs: Unix timestamp of last position modification

fields.name: fee_infos
docs: Information about claimed and unclaimed fees

fields.name: total_claimed_fee_x_amount
docs: Account authorized to claim fees from this position

fields.name: total_claimed_fee_y_amount
docs: Total unclaimed fees earned in token Y

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved space for future use

types.name: ProtocolFee
docs: Protocol fee accumulator storing fees collected from swaps.
Fees are tracked separately for each token to maintain accurate accounting
and enable independent fee collection for X and Y tokens.

fields.name: amount_x
docs: Accumulated protocol fees for token X

fields.name: amount_y
docs: Accumulated protocol fees for token Y

types.name: StaticParameters
docs: Static fee configuration parameters set by the protocol.
These parameters remain constant during normal pair operation and control
the base fee structure and operational limits for the liquidity book pair.

fields.name: base_factor
docs: Base factor for fee calculation formula

fields.name: filter_period
docs: Filter period for high frequency trading detection in seconds

fields.name: decay_period
docs: Decay period for volatile fee reduction in seconds

fields.name: reduction_factor
docs: Reduction factor controlling volatile fee decrement rate

fields.name: variable_fee_control
docs: Variable fee scaling factor based on market dynamics

fields.name: max_volatility_accumulator
docs: Maximum volatility accumulator to cap volatile fees

fields.name: min_bin_id
docs: Minimum supported bin ID for this pair

fields.name: max_bin_id
docs: Maximum supported bin ID for this pair

fields.name: protocol_share
docs: Protocol fee share in basis points

fields.name: _padding
docs: Memory alignment padding

types.name: UserRewardInfo
docs: Tracks per-bin farming reward accumulation and pending rewards for all supported reward tokens.

types.name: VariableParameters
docs: Variable fee parameters that adjust based on market dynamics.
These parameters are updated during trading operations to reflect market
volatility and recent trading activity patterns.

fields.name: volatility_accumulator
docs: Current volatility accumulator measuring bin crossings

fields.name: volatility_reference
docs: Decayed volatility reference for fee calculation

fields.name: index_reference
docs: Reference bin ID from the last swap operation

fields.name: _padding
docs: Memory alignment padding

fields.name: last_update_timestamp
docs: Timestamp of last parameter update

fields.name: _padding_1
docs: Memory alignment padding

constants.name: BASIS_POINT_MAX
docs: Smallest step between bin is 0.01%, 1 bps

constants.name: BIN_ARRAY
docs: Seed constant for bin array PDA derivation

constants.name: BIN_ARRAY_BITMAP_SEED
docs: Seed constant for bin array bitmap extension PDA derivation

constants.name: BIN_ARRAY_BITMAP_SIZE
docs: Number of bin arrays that can be tracked in a single bitmap slot

constants.name: MAX_BASE_FACTOR_STEP
docs: Maximum allowed change in base factor per update (100 bps = 1%)

constants.name: MAX_BIN_ID
docs: Maximum bin ID supported. Computed based on 1 bps.

constants.name: MAX_FEE_RATE
docs: Maximum fee rate. 10%

constants.name: MAX_PROTOCOL_SHARE
docs: Maximum protocol share of the fee. 25%

constants.name: MIN_BIN_ID
docs: Minimum bin ID supported. Computed based on 1 bps.

constants.name: MIN_FEE_UPDATE_WINDOW
docs: Minimum time window in seconds between fee parameter updates (0 = no restriction)

constants.name: SEED
docs: Seed constant for liquidity book pair PDA derivation
